The Grasshopper Place.name: The Grasshopper Place
The Grasshopper Place.overview: A delightful restaurant offering a variety of culinary delights.
The Grasshopper Place.distance: 0.2 miles from the Stamford Etihad Stadium
The Grasshopper Place.description: The Grasshopper Place is a charming restaurant that offers a warm and inviting atmosphere. With a diverse menu featuring a range of culinary delights, there's something for everyone. Whether you're looking for a casual lunch or a memorable dinner, The Grasshopper Place is sure to satisfy your taste buds. The restaurant's central location makes it easily accessible for both locals and visitors to Manchester. Experience exceptional service and delectable cuisine at The Grasshopper Place.
